NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Technical Associate Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 15:02 IST
 National Institute of Technology
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Assam |  Salary : 25,000 to 28,000




FOLLOW

The National Institute of Technology, Silchar (NIT Silchar) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Technical Associate Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.Sc. can apply for the NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Assam.

NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Technical Associate	01	M.Sc

NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 30 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the 

Online interview/ Hybrid Mode.

NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 25,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 28,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned e-mail address.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

E-mail Address:

rgnair@phy.nits.ac.in.

Important Dates:

Starting date	13-08-2025
Closing date	03-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
